name: Bai Yuekui
description: Have the courage to make mistakes in course of seeking scientific truth.

set.2: Upon switching to this weapon, if weapon charge is between **200** and **999**, consume **200** weapon charge to increase ATK by **15%**/18%/21%/25% for **15** seconds. **5**-second cooldown. This effect does not stack.
set.4: For every **0.6** seconds maintained in a dischargeable state, the **next** discharge skill deals extra area damage equal to **106%**/122%/140%/160% of ATK for **1** time in a 5-meter radius, up to **530%**/610%/700%/800%. In addition, increase shatter by **7%**/14%/21%/28% for **4** seconds. This effect does not stack. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
